mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL,1,1,#{userEmail},#{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_EMAIL = 'USER1' AND USER_PWD = '1234' AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_NICKNAME =#{userNickname}, PHONE = #{phone}, ZIPCODE = #{zipcode}, ADDRESS1 = #{address1}, ADDRESS2 = #{address2}, ADDRESS3 = #{address3}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT POST_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, P.CREATE_DATE, P.MODIFY_DATE, USER_NO, BOARD_NO, SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO, SC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO, IA.CHANGE_NAME FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN BOARD B USING (USER_NO) LEFT JOIN POST P USING (POST_NO) LEFT JOIN IMG_ATTACHMENT IA ON (B.BOARD_NO = IA.REF_BNO) LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO WHERE M.USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} AND IMG_LEVEL = 1 AND P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY POST_NO DESC

SELECT M.USER_EMAIL, C.COMMENT_NO, C.BOARD_NO, C.USER_NO, C.CONTENT, C.CREATE_DATE, C.MODIFY_DATE, SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO, SC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO, P.POST_NO FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" C ON (M.USER_NO=C.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON (C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN POST P ON B.POST_NO=P.POST_NO WHERE M.USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} AND C.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY C.COMMENT_NO DESC
